Narada client examples

There are four Narada example scripts, which are by no means complete, but demonstrate how SHM sensors can be incorporated into a SenStore database.

  • The script narada_create.py shows how to create objects in the SenStore server for holding Narada unit and channel definitions, and raw sensor data for each channel. A script like this would be run at installation of a SenStore server.
  • The script narada_save.py shows how sensor data can be stored on the server. A script like this would be run every time new sensor data becomes available.
  • The script narada_query.py shows how to find a particular Narada unit and channel defined on the server, and obtain information on the sensor data stored.
  • The script narada_load.py shows how to read sensor data from the server and output it as space-separated text, which could be saved to file and read into MATLAB or EXCEL.
